string.value: Manji's apprentice, Mu Young, has a pensive look on his face. Shall we hear what he has to say?

Mu Young says his master was right to worry. He says, Balrog, who was sealed by Tristan a number of decades ago, is preparing to reemerge. He has asked you to form a Expeditionary Team to prevent Balrog from reviving.

He has asked you to form a Expeditionary Team to prevent Balrog from reviving.\r\nBut as you tried to prevent Balrog's revival, he disappeared into thin air, and you had to tell Mu Young.

string.name: summary
string.value: Let's form an Expeditionary Team and go into the cave where Balrog is sealed. You will do what you can to prevent Balrog from reviving and report back to Mu Young.
I know he wouldn't trust just anyone with something like this. If you were sent by my master, I assume you are one heck of an adventurer and I can really use your help. Will you help me?

I came here to investigate at the request of my master and discovered something amazing. Many decades ago, my master was able to seal Balrog in this area where Tristan the hero was buried. But I keep finding subtle signs of Balrog's impending revival.

So I went deep into the dungeon to stop Balrog from reviving, but that place was filled with powerful energy. I mean, the force of Balrog was tremendously strong even though he hasn't even revived yet.
I don't know if I'd be able to handle Balrog on my own, even if he hasn't awakened. #bCould you please form an Expeditionary Team to help me prevent Balrog's revival?
Please, think about it. I really need your help.

Ah, you're back! What happened to Balrog?

#b#L0#Hmmm... I don't know. The dungeon began to shake and he disappeared into the air.#l
#k
Really? Where could Balrog have disappeared to? Well, at least we were able to keep him from hurting anyone. Thank you so much.
My master was right again. You are one amazing adventurer.
Balrog is sealed behind that door. I don't recommend going in alone. I think it would be best if you entered with others after forming an Expeditionary Team.
